title: Introduction to combat fatigue
creator_credit: United States. Dept. of the Navy
brief_description: This film was designed for screening to medical staff in a psychiatric hospital during World War II. It attempts to explain what fear is and how it can affect soldiers. Uses flash-backs to combat scenes to recall their fears.
